title: [Large-Scale] Knowledge-Based Mathematics Curriculum Design Through Experiential Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental mathematical concepts at the middle school level
context.additional_context: A curriculum designed to enhance the practical competencies of current professionals, focusing on delivering field-applicable knowledge in a constrained technological environment (smartphone-based).

learning_goals: Learners can integrate mathematical concepts and cognitive science principles to solve real-world problems.
Learners can explain the connections between subject-specific knowledge (mathematics) and professional fields (medical/legal/technical).
Learners can collaboratively reconstruct and present knowledge acquired through experiential activities with peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
